name: Shrimp Tank
description:
A small plattformer developed in 72 h for ludum-dare-38.

You are a Shrimp in a small world surounded by thick glass. Your goal: Eat, grow and finally give birth to your children. But beware! Some of the habitants are known for their predator behavior...

Controls:

"a" and "d" OR "left" and "right" arrowkeys to move left and right

"space" to jump, after one second you can use it again even in midair

(eats automatically)

--- Update: 2018.07.01

Now with touch control for mobile devices. Touch the left and right border of the screen to move around and swipe upward to jump.
